item.title: Starter pack per IP [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Serberus7 Serberus7
item.description:
@Serberus7 wrote:

Yes, i’ve used the search function.
If there is a tutorial out there for this direct me to it and call me a dumbass, that’s cool

Anyway… what im trying to do is something along the lines of this.

if (!Connection.hasRecieved1stStarter(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom)) { //get items Connection.addIpToStarterList1(Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom); }

I’ve seen this code on another server, although I’m not quite sure how the list works.

Edit: Nevermind… I really am a dumbass lol
I’ll make a tutorial for this since I couldn’t find one!
DAMNIT I WANTED TO MAKE A TUTORIAL!
I REFRESHED AFTER I ALREADY FIGURED IT OUT AND BOOM…

Read full topic
